img.alt: South Dearborn Red and White Logo

span.strong:
Welcome to South Dearborn Community School Corporation, where our schools share a community commitment for each student to be Success Driven. Our safe and secure campus offers a beautiful setting for learning for students in grades K-12. With four elementary schools, one middle school and one high school, our school corporation provides a format for learning that is designed to meet the needs of all children.
At South Dearborn, we are "Success Driven." Grow. Excel. Achieve.
Our Mission

div.br:
Success Driven
Our Vision
Grow...Excel...Achieve
What We Believe
South Dearborn Community School Corporation believes:
Data-driven, personalized learning experiences increase student achievement.
All students can achieve at higher levels.
Students must be actively engaged in their own education.
A rigorous and relevant curriculum fosters college and career readiness, and supports a systematic framework to engage student learning.
It takes a strong community partnership to collaboratively educate students efficiently and effectively.
The effective application of technology enhances curriculum and increases corporation efficiency.
Extracurricular activities promote learning and develop a well-rounded, comprehensive educational experience.
What We Value
An educational framework that drives student success.
Teachers who effectively deliver instruction, are accountable for student learning, and are dedicated advocates for students.
Personnel who are dedicated to common goals, fiscal responsibility, and well-maintained, clean facilities within a safe and secure learning environment.
Safe, Secure & Beautiful Campus
A beautiful school setting helps set the tone for your child's learning. South Dearborn boasts a gorgeous campus, modern facilities and Internet access in every classroom.
In addition to providing comfortable surroundings, we understand that in order to learn effectively our children need to feel safe, comfortable and at ease. Rest assured that our students' safety is top of mind at all times and we've taken the steps necessary to ensure that all of our students are secure.
Corporation Goals & Action Plan
1. Develop and implement the framework needed to receive AdvanceEd, K-12 District Accreditation.
2. Improve stakeholder satisfaction.
3. Prepare and implement research-based school safety plan for measuring and improving building and staff safety preparedness.
4. Increase capacity to utilize technology in the classroom.

div.div:
Learn more about our staff, alumni, and events by clicking a title below:
Aurora Elementary School hosts 'Read With a Knight'
Meet Our Team Monday: Mrs. Dianna Petty
Meet Our Team Monday: Ms. Kelsie Shock
Alumni Spotlight: Mr. Jeremy Dilts
Meet Our Team Monday: Mrs. Samantha Geary
Dillsboro Elementary School Explores Preschool Program Option
Meet Our Team Monday: Mrs. Amy Beam
Meet Our Team Monday: Rachel Ransom
Meet Our Team Monday: Mrs. Nina Litchfield
Meet Our Team Monday: Angie Little

div.img:
Opportunity awaits at South Dearborn Schools! From dynamic academic programs, award winning music and arts groups, and comprehensive athletic teams, our students have access to the widest variety of educational opportunities. Located in Aurora, Indiana yet within easy driving distance to Cincinnati, we provide small town community based learning with access to bigger city opportunities.
From an academic perspective, our school corporation recently had the highest ISTEP score increase compared to other area schools. South Dearborn High School has also received an AdvancED Accreditation – which is a designation that shows our commitment to academic excellence. These are just a few indications of the commitment to academic achievement that you'll find throughout the entire South Dearborn Community School Corporation.
At South Dearborn, students are engaged in a progressive, innovative atmosphere that is student-centered and highly interactive. Our students enjoy the best of all worlds with a school culture that provides an ideal mix of academics, arts and athletics.
We believe that our parents and students deserve access to resources that will help them get the most of our their school experience. With that in mind, South Dearborn schools cover a portion of every student's textbook fees.
Enrollment Data
Aurora Elementary: 500 Students
Dillsboro Elementary: 250 Students
Manchester Elementary: 240 Students
Moores Hill Elementary: 140 Students
South Dearborn Middle School: 360 Students
South Dearborn High School: 750 Students
2015-2016 Grades
South Dearborn School Corporation: B
South Dearborn High School: B
South Dearborn Middle School: C
Dillsboro Elementary: B
Manchester Elementary: B
Moores Hill: B
Aurora Elementary: C
Learn more about us!
Our Mission
E-Learning Initiative
South Dearborn Careers
South Dearborn Super Chat Podcast
Contact Us
